other_tests.findings: Histological findings confirmed diagnosis of ARVD.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Antiarrhythmic treatment with sotalol was started, with efficacy confirmed by a decrease in the number of PVCs.

other_tests.findings: Inverted T waves in leads V2 and V3.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Despite drainage, intracranial pressure increased progressively after surgery.
Intracranial hypertension led to brain death on the ninth postoperative day.

other_tests.findings: Patient had episodes of regular hypotension attributed to clomipramine.
Left ventricular ejection fraction of 60%, cardiac output of 6.2 l/min.
Imaging studies revealed agenesis of the corpus callosum.
Generalized disturbances compatible with cortical and subcortical grey matter dysfunction, but no epileptiform activity.
